en_text: Deal 10x ATK Dark damage to an enemy and recover the amount as HP

jp_skill.name: 龍力解放の呪焔
jp_skill.raw_description: 敵1体に攻撃力×10倍の闇属性で攻撃し、 与えたダメージ分のHPを回復。

kr_skill.name: 용심해방의 주염
kr_skill.raw_description: 하나의 적에게 공격력x10배의 어둠속성 공격을 하고 공격한 대미지만큼 HP를 회복한다

na_skill.name: Dragon Strength Spellflame
na_skill.raw_description: Makes a 10x ATK Dark Att. attack on 1 enemy, plus the damage is recovered as HP
